meanings.definition: Lagomorphs: a group of mammals including rabbits and hares.
meanings.sent1: In the forest, we spotted lagomorphs hopping around.
meanings.sent2: The lagomorphs in the meadow were busy nibbling on grass.
meanings.sent3: The lagomorphs had a hopping race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The lagomorphs multiplied in number, filling the field with life.
meanings.sent5: Children love to read stories about lagomorphs and their adventures.

meanings.definition: Lagomorphs: pertaining to or characteristic of rabbits and hares.
meanings.sent1: The lagomorphs family adopted a cute bunny as their pet.
meanings.sent2: Her room was decorated with lagomorphs-themed wallpaper.
meanings.sent3: The lagomorphs party was filled with carrot-themed decorations.
meanings.sent4: His lagomorphs-like ears were the talk of the town.
meanings.sent5: The lagomorphs behavior of the rabbit made everyone smile.
